project.title: Bellator
project.description:
Bellator is more than a company‚Äîit‚Äôs a promise. A promise to deliver real value through innovative products and services that stand the test of time.
The name Bellator, meaning ‚Äúwarrior‚Äù in Latin, reflects our philosophy. Business, much like life, is a battlefield ‚Äîa competition of ideas, excellence, and service. To succeed, we must be relentless in delivering superior value and forging pathways for sustainable growth.

project_updates.title: FULL Node & Italy Convertible Ending Feb 11
project_updates.content:
Bellator Community - Key Updates & What to Know

Here are the most important takeaways as Bellator moves into its next growth phase:

‚úÖ Miracle Pay Is Going Live

  • On or before February 25, Miracle Pay launches merchant onboarding in Europe, with Shopify integrations

  • This marks the start of real transaction flow and real-world usage across the ecosystem

‚è∞ Node Sales Are Closing Soon

  • FULL Node sales end:
    February 11 @ 11:59 PM (Hawaii Time)

  • Italy Convertible Node ends:
    February 12 @ 11:59 PM (Hawaii Time)

  • Farm Node remains available at $99 (pays 1/14 of a FULL Node)

üëâ After this cutoff, the company will observe 90 days of live activity before deciding if the FULL Node returns - and at what pricing.

üìà Why This Matters for Keyholders

  • Internal projections (not guaranteed) suggest the FULL Node could exceed $10,000 in value over the next three years

  • The upcoming period focuses on activation, usage, and data, not new sales

üî• Active Opportunities Right Now

Project X

  • Pays $1.60/day

  • Plus $0.40/day into the compensation plan

Guardian Node

  • Paying daily now

  • MIRx price increases to $0.70 on February 9 @ 11:59 PM (Hawaii Time)

  • Guardian Node price adjusts to $2,800

  • MIRx listing on MEXC in ~5 weeks with an opening price of $1.25

üéÆ Ecosystem Is Expanding

  • Phoenic Arena is live

  • Bingo and Bowling launching soon

  • More games already in development

  • Miracle Chain DEX and Lending Protocol launching soon

üåç Momentum & Expansion

  • February was a record month for Bellator Life

  • Multiple members earned $20,000+ in a single month

  • All asset holders earned in February

  • Africa expansion begins soon

  • Nigeria launches February 28

Bottom line:
Infrastructure is going live.
Transactions are starting.
And the ecosystem is moving from setup to execution.
project_updates.summary:
Dear Bellator Community,

 

I wanted to share an important update to help everyone plan the weeks ahead and understand where we are in the rollout of our ecosystem.

 

We are going live on or before February 25th with Miracle Pay merchant onboarding in Europe, along with online Shopify integrations. This represents a major milestone for the company and a critical step in activating real-world transaction flow through our platform.

 

Because of this transition:

Sales of the Miracle Pay FULL Node will officially end on Wednesday, February 11th at 11:59 PM (Hawaii Time).

 

The Italy Convertible Node will also end on Thursday, February 12th at 11:59 PM (Hawaii Time).

 

We will continue offering the Farm Node at $99, which pays 1/14th of a FULL Node.

 

Based on our internal projections (not a guarantee), the FULL Node value could exceed $10,000 within the next three years. We are intentionally stepping back after this cutoff to observe the first 90 days of live activity across Europe, online commerce, and South America before considering whether the FULL Node returns ‚Äî and at what new pricing.

 

Active Opportunities

 

Project X

 

Pays $1.60 per day

Plus $0.40 per day into the compensation plan

 

Guardian Node

 

Paying daily right now

MIRx price increases to $0.70 on Monday, February 9th at 11:59 PM (Hawaii Time)

 

Guardian Node price adjusts to $2,800, which we believe represents exceptional value

 

In approximately 5 weeks, MIRx goes live on MEXC with an opening price of $1.25

 

Ecosystem & Platform Updates

 

Phoenic Arena is live: https://phoenicarena.com

Bingo and Bowling launching soon

Additional game concepts already in development

 

Miracle Chain

DEX and Lending Protocol launching soon

On-chain activity expected to increase as adoption grows

 

Growth Highlights

February was a record month for Bellator Life

Several representatives earned over $20,000 in a single month

Most importantly, everyone holding an asset earned in February

Africa expansion begins at the end of the month

Nigeria launch on February 28th

 

This is a defining phase for the company. Real infrastructure is going live, transaction flow is beginning, and the ecosystem is activating exactly as designed.

 

Thank you for being part of this journey.

Let‚Äôs keep building.
Let‚Äôs keep executing.
Let‚Äôs keep rocking it.

 

 

With energy and gratitude,

Micah
The Bellator team

bellatorlife.com

üß†‚ú®Subscribe to see Insight and Takeaways below!

project_updates.title: Understanding the Miracle Pay Earnings Discussion
project_updates.content:
üìä Understanding the Miracle Pay Earnings Discussion

A community explainer (educational, not predictive)

Over the past update, leadership walked through illustrative modeling to help the community understand why Miracle Pay nodes exist and how leverage works in payment infrastructure. This post breaks that down clearly - without promises, projections, or guarantees.

‚ö†Ô∏è First, the Ground Rules

Before diving in, it‚Äôs important to be clear:

  • These figures were shared for educational context only

  • They are not guarantees, projections, or financial advice

  • Actual results depend on:

    • Merchant adoption

    • User behavior

    • Market conditions

    • Execution, regulation, and competition

  • All participation in crypto and early-stage infrastructure is high risk

Anyone claiming guaranteed returns or fixed outcomes is not representing the company accurately.

üåç The Market Being Discussed (High-Level Context)

Miracle Pay is being built as a crypto-to-fiat payment gateway integrated with global terminal providers (e.g., Ingenico, PAX, NCR, Verifone).

These providers collectively support tens of millions of merchant terminals worldwide.

To explain scale, leadership used conservative, simplified assumptions, such as:

  • Average merchant daily sales: ~$1,000‚Äì$2,500

  • Global daily transaction volume across terminals: $100B‚Äì$250B

This represents traditional fiat commerce, not crypto volume.

üìâ Hypothetical Adoption Scenarios (Illustrative Only)

To avoid overstating expectations, the discussion focused on very small adoption percentages:

  • 0.1% adoption (one-tenth of one percent)

  • 0.5% adoption

  • 1% adoption (long-term, aggressive scenario)

At 0.1% adoption, modeled crypto transaction volume would be:

  • $100M‚Äì$250M per day

These numbers are not forecasts - they‚Äôre reference points to explain why payments infrastructure can scale quickly.

üß© How Nodes Were Explained

Key points shared:

  • 210,000 nodes participate in the compensation structure

  • Nodes do not receive transaction volume - they participate in a small share of fees

  • Leadership used a fee share of ~0.25% purely for explanation

This was meant to show how volume spreads across infrastructure, not to imply fixed payouts.

üí∞ Illustrative Earnings Examples (Not Promises)

Under the most conservative scenario discussed (0.1% adoption), the following illustrative ranges were shared:

Daily Network Volume

Approx. Monthly Per-Node Earnings*

$100M/day

~$3,500/month

$150M/day

~$5,300/month

$250M/day

~$8,900/month

*Figures shown were hypothetical examples, not expected results.

Actual outcomes could be lower, higher, or zero.

üè∑Ô∏è Asset Value Discussion (Conceptual Only)

Leadership also explained a common business concept:

Businesses are sometimes valued using multiples of annual earnings.

Using a 10√ó multiple was described as a thought exercise, not a valuation.

This was meant to help participants understand how markets think about assets, not what any node will be worth.

‚è≥ Why This Was Shared Now

This explanation was provided because:

  • Miracle Pay is nearing live merchant onboarding

  • Once real data exists, modeling becomes less relevant

  • Future node structures (if any) will be based on actual performance, not assumptions

  • Early participation reflects early-stage uncertainty, not guaranteed upside

How Value Flows Through the Ecosystem

(Conceptual overview ‚Äî not financial guidance)

Entry into the Ecosystem
‚Üí Community members acquire access or participation rights
‚Üí Participation is tied to ecosystem usage, not investment promises

Platform Activity Begins
‚Üí Products, services, and tools within the ecosystem are used
‚Üí Activity is driven by real engagement and demand

Ecosystem Utility Is Created
‚Üí Usage generates operational value across the platform
‚Üí Value is tied to functionality, adoption, and network effects

Network Grows & Strengthens
‚Üí More participants increase interaction and use cases
‚Üí Ecosystem becomes more efficient and resilient over time

Value Circulates Internally
‚Üí Value flows back into the ecosystem
‚Üí Supports infrastructure, development, and sustainability

Participant Alignment
‚Üí Active participants may benefit from ecosystem growth
‚Üí Outcomes depend on platform performance and engagement

Long-Term Vision
‚Üí Focus on building a durable, utility-driven ecosystem
‚Üí Emphasis on participation, contribution, and adoption

Why This Matters for the Community

  • Shows how value moves, not what anyone earns

  • Reinforces utility over speculation

  • Keeps expectations grounded in usage and participation

  • Aligns with long-term ecosystem thinking

üß† The Core Takeaway

The earnings discussion was not about selling outcomes. It was about explaining:

  • Why payment infrastructure has leverage

  • Why early participation carries both risk and potential

  • Why conservative modeling matters

  • Why no one should rely on assumptions alone

This is about understanding the system, not predicting results.
project_updates.summary:
This is a post from Ben Funsch as the admin for this project in iiZR. Our hope is that this will help any questions you may have regarding the Miracle Pay part of the attached video.

project_faqs.question: What is Bellator?
project_faqs.answer: Bellator is associated with the Miracle Cash & More brand and ecosystem, which operates under the larger umbrella of MetaTerra Holdings. Promotional materials reference connections to Miracle Pay, Miracle Chain, and related crypto-fintech products.
